ActAgricultural Marketing Programs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Schedule to the Agricultural Marketing Programs Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the SCHEDULE TO THE AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS ACT, in order to update the list of Business Risk Management (BRM) programs that may be used by producers as security for cash advances under the Advance Payments Program (APP).
